english: People who are different , their time is coming
chinese: 特立独行的那群人，他们的时代来临了。

english: This is the problem with being a deviant ,
chinese: 问题在于你要是特立独行一些

english: Katherine watson lived by her own definition
Because only i who is antique i ' m nothing in their eyes
chinese: 因为只有我是特立独行的我在他们眼中什么也不是

english: Do not particularly push yourself forward , or else you are unwelcome
chinese: 不要太特立独行，否则你将会是不受欢迎的。
特立独行造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: You insist on having your way
Trash is how we distinguish ourselves from all the things others want us to be
chinese: 正是文化垃圾，让我们特立独行而非亦步亦趋。

english: The addu people are fiercely independent and speak differently from people in the capital
chinese: 阿杜人极为特立独行,说话都和首都人不同。

english: The republican maverick wasdisliked and distrusted by too many in the party
chinese: 而在共和党内部，有太多人对这位特立独行者抱以嫌恶和不信任的态度。

english: Best known in britain for his legendary work for the dance company s . o . a . p . ,
chinese: 曾经获得大奖的葡萄牙舞蹈家ruihorta是一位在舞蹈界特立独行的艺术家。

english: We were a bunch of americans with nothing in common , except we wanted to learn to fly
chinese: 我们是一群特立独行的美国人,大家的共同目标是当一名飞行员

english: Or the ones who were irreverent storytellers , enthusiasts , easily distracted mavericks
chinese: 还是那些不受尊敬的故事讲述者、狂热分子以及容易分心的特立独行者？

english: In 1975 tommy was adapted as a film , directed by maverick british auteur ken russell
chinese: 1975年, 《汤米》被改编成电影,由特立独行的英国电影导演肯?拉塞尔执导。

english: Mourinho is a winner with attitude ; he is therefore never going to win the public vote
chinese: 穆里尼奥是个特立独行的胜者；所以他不指望在公众中赢得很多支持的票。

english: A group of artists who had their works . some friends certainly will be very familiar with them
chinese: 一群特立独行的漫画家们的作品。有些朋友肯定会很熟悉他们的。
